mapper.sql: ID, SERVER_ID, NAME, MAX_LEVEL, MIN_LEVEL, MAX_ONLINE, CHANNEL_ID, IS_TCP, MAX_TEAM_LEVEL, MIN_TEAM_LEVEL
mapper.select:
select count(*) from CHANNEL where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or `NAME` like '${searchValue}%' or SERVER_ID like '${searchValue}%' or CHANNEL_ID like '${searchValue}%')
mapper.insert: insert into CHANNEL (ID, SERVER_ID, NAME, MAX_LEVEL, MIN_LEVEL, MAX_ONLINE, CHANNEL_ID, IS_TCP, MAX_TEAM_LEVEL, MIN_TEAM_LEVEL) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTcp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER})

replace into CHANNEL (ID, SERVER_ID, NAME, MAX_LEVEL, MIN_LEVEL, MAX_ONLINE, CHANNEL_ID, IS_TCP, MAX_TEAM_LEVEL, MIN_TEAM_LEVEL) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.maxLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.minLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.maxOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isTcp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.maxTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.minTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER})

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
insert into CHANNEL
ID,
SERVER_ID,
NAME,
MAX_LEVEL,
MIN_LEVEL,
MAX_ONLINE,
CHANNEL_ID,
IS_TCP,
MAX_TEAM_LEVEL,
MIN_TEAM_LEVEL,

mapper.update:
update CHANNEL
SERVER_ID = #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAX_LEVEL = #{maxLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MIN_LEVEL = #{minLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAX_ONLINE = #{maxOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_TCP = #{isTcp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAX_TEAM_LEVEL = #{maxTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MIN_TEAM_LEVEL = #{minTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update CHANNEL set SERVER_ID = #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAX_LEVEL = #{maxLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MIN_LEVEL = #{minLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAX_ONLINE = #{maxOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_TCP = #{isTcp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAX_TEAM_LEVEL = #{maxTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MIN_TEAM_LEVEL = #{minTeamLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
